channel.title: 2 Problems, one of them easy, please help me =)
channel.description:
1) I cant seem to get my Devolution source to change... Whenever i put a new piece of code in (which im 100% sure of is correct) it doesnt work. Why? What I did: - Copy a piece of code which is working (I checked) - Change the npcID to the desired number, this is also correct. - Compile, getting no errors. Doesnt work. Can anyone tell me why? I used Devolution V7.
2) How can I put objects (like walls or doors) in certain places. I dont want it to be server-sided though. Is that possible or not?
Thanks alot for even reading ;)

item.title: 2 Problems, one of them easy, please help me =)

item.description:
@erwinho14 wrote:

simple answer but did ya restart the server after compiling it?
